All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Ball
abstract class Ball which is to be inherited by Rubber Ball
Brick
abstract class Brick which is inherited by subclasses, ClayBrick, CementBrick, SteelBrick, YellowBrick
CementBrick
CementBrick class which inherits from superclass, Brick
CementBrickTest
 
ClayBrick
ClayBrick class which inherits from superclass, Brick
ClayBrickTest
 
Crack
 
CrackTest
 
DebugConsole
DebugConsole is a JDialog that holds the debugpanel component which can be activated with key (alt+shift+f1)
DebugPanel
DebugPanel is a panel that contains the 2 buttons and 2 sliders
GameBoard
GameBoard is the renderer of the game itself where it draws the wall, ball, player it also holds a pause menu, debugConsole
GameFrame
GameFrame is a JFrame that holds multiple component which are homeMenu and gameBoard
GraphicsMain
 
HomeMenu
HomeMenu is a JComponent pops up first when program is initialized HomeMenu holds 3 buttons, start, exit, info
InfoFrame
InfoFrame that pops up when info button is clicked in HomeMenu
Level
 
LevelTest
 
Player
Player class which represents the green bar that player are supposed to control
PlayerTest
